name: Touhou Eternal Spell Cards
description:
"Eastern Eternal Spell Cards" is a fan-made game that focuses on Reimu Hakurei from the Touhou Project. Set in Gensokyo, a realm where the balance between humans and yokai is in jeopardy, players assume the role of Reimu as she embarks on an eternal adventure.

【Exciting BOSS battles】


In the game, players will face various challenging spell card battles. Each stage tests their reflexes, strategic thinking, and skill utilization. Players must skillfully dodge enemy bullet patterns while using Reimu's unique spell card abilities to defeat powerful bosses.



Throughout the game, players will explore diverse stages and environments, such as mysterious forests, abandoned shrines, and ethereal lakes. Each stage features a unique background story and design, immersing players in a world full of Eastern fantasy.

【character interaction】


In addition to spell card battles, the game offers rich storytelling and character interactions. Players engage in dialogues and exchanges with other characters, unraveling their storylines and uncovering hidden secrets. Through these interactions, players gain deeper insights into Reimu's worldview and her adventurous journey.

【Gorgeous barrage】


The game emphasizes challenge and a sense of accomplishment. It offers multiple difficulty levels to cater to players of different skill levels. Players can continuously improve their skills, unlock higher-level spell card abilities, and showcase their achievements on leaderboards.



With meticulously designed spell card battles, diverse stages, and engaging storylines, "Eastern Eternal Spell Cards" delivers an exciting and immersive adventure where players can push their limits and strive for eternal victory. It captures the unique charm and exquisite music that the Touhou Project series is known for. Whether newcomers or long-time fans, players will find endless fun and surprises in this splendid world of Touhou.

Friends who love this game and are deeply interested in the theme of Touhou Project are welcome to join our game exchange group to share experiences, exchange insights, and immerse themselves in this fascinating Oriental world!
